summary: Cries in front of.
question: Cries in front of.
answer:
Gamora’s eyes widened at the display.  She tentatively reached a hand out, but paused.  She finally gave in and placed a hand on his shoulder.

“Are you okay?  What happened?”

Her heart broke seeing him like this.

She was determined to make things right.

blog.name: hellzyeahthewebwieldingavenger
blog.title: Hellz Yeah, Spider-Man: The Web Wielding Avenger
blog.description:
A blog all about my love for Peter Benjamin Parker, his friends, family, enemies and world in general. Expect images, rants, musings and long winded essays of the Web Head and why I think he's the greatest comic book Superhero of all time. 

I LOVE comments and questions so leave some as you pass by as well as call me on any facts I have gotten wrong.

Also check out my sub-pages for F.A.Q.s and a key for when I abbreviate.

summary: Spider-Man Real Time Timeline
title: Spider-Man Real Time Timeline
body:
Inspired by Spider-Man: Life Story I tried making a (possible) timeline for 616 Peter Parker’s life. I admit I had to cheat at certain points due to a lack of information. If anyone else wants to suggest alternate timelines it’d be interesting to compare them.

I admit parts of this I had to guesstimate so I welcome feedback or alternative suggestions.* With any luck we could pin this down year by year.

For the record this isn’t intended to be used to bash Life Story if it dare violate this timeline, it’s just for fun.

Also for the record I used the Marvel Chronology Project Spider-Man page as the skeleton for my timeline.
http://www.chronologyproject.com/spidey.php


Birth-Spider Bite

1947-1962: Birth-Age 15


Spider-Bite-High School Graduation (AF #15-ASM #28, Aug 1962-Sept 1965)
1962-1965: 15-18


Summer before college-College graduation (ASM #29-ASM #185, Oct 1965-Oct 1978)
1965-1969: 18-22


Post college graduation-Dropping out of Grad School (Spec #21-ASM #244, Aug 1978-Sept 1983)
1969-1970: 22-23


Post-Grad School-Second Black Cat break up (Spec #81-Spec #100, Aug 1983-Mar 1985)
1970-1971: 23-24


Defeating the symbiote in the bell tower-Peter is buried alive by Kraven (Web #1-Web #31/Web #32, Apr 1985-Oct/Nov 1987)
1971-1972: 24-25


Peter escapes his coffin-Ben Reilly standing in for Peter at his murder trial (Web #32-ASM #403, Nov 1987-July 1995)
1972-1974: 25-27


Peter found not guilty-Spidey and Black Cat team up on a drug case (Spec #226-Spider-Man and the Black Cat: The Evil That Men Do #2, July 1995-Sept 2002)
1974-1976: 27-29


Spidey and Black Cat’s drug case-Ezekiel ‘warns’ Peter that a third mystical totem threat is coming for Peter (Spider-Man and the Black Cat: The Evil That Men Do #3-ASM #506 Oct 2002-June 2004)
1976-1977: 29-30


The third totem threat appears-The morning after Aunt May and Jay Jameson’s wedding (ASM #507-ASM #601, July 2004-Oct 2009).
1977-1979: 30-32

ASM #601 states Peter last saw MJ over a year ago, which would have been Harry’s party at the end of One More Day. Since you have all the time from the ‘Book of Ezekiel’ until One More Day/Peter and MJ’s post-OMD break up (which had it’s own fair share of smaller time skips) along with the time skip from their break up to Harry’s party and then ‘over a year’ passes, it seems reasonable to scale this unaccounted for time to a total of another year

Spidey tells Jessica Jones she should return to being a hero-Present (ASM #601-ASM #818, Oct 2009-Mar 2019).
1979-1982: 32-35

This is where the major guess work is. Superior was one year, the gap from the end of vol 3 to the start of vol 4 was 16 months but the time before Superior, the time after until the end of volume 3, the time from volume 4 to now. That’s more up in the air, but it seems highly unlikely to me that it would all add up to LESS than 8 months.



*For example in Kevin Smith’s ever reliable ‘Evil that Men Do’ mini-series he has Felicia claim she and Peter broke up five years ago but it’s unclear which break up she is referring to. I chose their Spec #100 one because it seemed to just make more sense with the timeline over all.

Another example would be placing the previously mentioned mini during the first half of the JMS run around when it originally began and was intended to happen even though the second half was years later and some sources place the mini over all around that time period. It just didn’t make sense to me to play it that way.

Also some of this involved actively ignoring Marvel stories claiming the characters to be younger than they actually should be, e.g. the Clone Saga claiming Peter is 25 which makes no sense or Learning to Crawl implying Peter was only 28 in 2014 which is even more ridiculous. I just took him being 15 as the starting point and went from there.

summary: London Calling - Peter x reader
title: London Calling - Peter x reader
body:
SUMMARY: Peter Parker, your childhood best friend, takes you out for your last meal in Queens before you fly to England.

WARNINGS: just fluff here!

WORD COUNT: 880

A/N: i literaly havent written anything for like 4 months, i have no idea what this was origionally for but i found it in my drafts? so i dusted her off so here she is?

MASTERLIST | TAGS | REQUESTS

“Hey, [Y/N]. Why are you packing?” Peter asks, a slight tremble in his voice.

“I’m going to look at this university, in London. It’s the best one for the field I’m going into. I have an interview with this super important professor! If I make a good impression with her, I basically have a place in the school,” you explain, folding some tee shirts.

“Oh,” he sighs, looking disappointed. “Hey, when do you leave?” Peter asks, attempting to sound chirpy.

“Day after tomorrow.”

“Oh, well do you want to grab a bite to eat with me?”

“Of course! Let me just get changed and I’ll meet you in a moment,” you smile as Peter walks out the room. You slip on a dress, placing a coat over the top to try combat the cold winds. Walking out the door, you see Peter leaning against the wall.

“Hey.” You wave.

“Ready to go, m’lady?” He laughs, extending his arm for you.

“As I’ll ever be!”

————

He leads you to the pizzeria the two of you always frequent.

“What a good choice!” You smile as you walk inside the restaurant.

Peter goes up to the counter and orders two pizzas for the both of you, knowing you wouldn’t want to share. He pays the cashier in loose change, counting out every penny.

“They’ll be ready in just a moment!” Peter says excitedly, hiding his financial situation from you.

“Great!” You laugh, tucking a loose strand of hair behind your ear.

“So why London?” He asks, trying to act casual while leaning on the counter.

“They have the best courses, everyone successful has been there!” You gush, getting excited of the thought of just going to such a prestigious school.

“Oh, that makes sense.”

“Order for two medium pizzas!” The cashier shouts, getting the attention of you and Peter.

You grab the two pizzas and start to walk out of the restaurant.

“Hey, where are we going?” Peter asks, jogging to catch up with you.

“I know a special little spot, I know you’re going to love it!” You gloat, taking a sharp turn down an alley.

“Down here?” Peter asks, confusion dripping from his voice.

“No, silly. Up there!” You point to the top of the building next to you before glancing to the fire escape next to you.

“Come on, Spiderman. Ready for a little climb? “ You laugh before sliding the pizzas up to the ledge and pulling yourself up the ladder.

He smirks and grabs the pizzas. He uses a web to launch himself to the top of the building.

“Come on, [Y/N]. Ready for a little climb?” He mocks your words from earlier, grinning from his perch.

You giggle and climb up to him.

“Like the view?” You ask, looking out across the New York skyline.

“It’s beautiful,” he sighs as he looks at the back of your head.

“Come on, let’s dig in!” You exclaim, sitting on the edge of the roof, the pizza box on your lap. You pat the ledge beside you, gesturing for Peter to sit down.

He plops down next to you, opening his pizza box. He smiles as the steam puffs up.

“Wow, this looks so good!” You smile, taking the piping hot pizza in your hands.

“I know! Pizza and a best friend, the best way to spend an evening.” He takes a small, meek bite.

“Pete, what’s up? You’ve been off since I told you about London…” You trail off when you realise his reason for his change in personality. “It won’t change anything, I’ll always be your best friend,” you say in a low voice, keeping calm to make sure Peter keeps calm.

“[Y/N, I know, I know nothing’ll change,” he reassures you, “but that’s the whole problem!” He shouts, his tone suddenly escalating. He stands up, letting the box full of pizza fall to the roof behind him. “Please, [Y/N, say you know what I mean?” He pleads, eyes begging you.

“Peter, I’m so sorry, I don’t know what you mean?”

“[Y/N I adore you! I love you and I always have!” His voice becomes small, “I don’t know what I’m going to do without you…”

He sits on the ledge again, legs crossed so he can face you. His hand comes to cup your cheek, tilting your head up to look you in the eyes. “[Y/N, please, please say something.”

“I don’t know what to say, Peter, I never knew you felt this way about me,” you lock eyes with the boy in front of you, “I think I love you too.”

The lips of your childhood friend interlock with your own, your hands find the back of his head. You lean forward, letting your arms wrap around his neck. He pulls back, only to plant a kiss to your forehead. You let your head fall to his lap, lying on the ledge of the tower of apartments you both grew up in.

“Are you still going to London?”

“I have to, Peter. This is the best opportunity of my life!” You exclaim, excitement in your voice.

“Think it’s too late to book a flight to London?”

“Of course not!” You laugh, leaning up to kiss him again.

“I’m going to look at this university, in London. It’s the best one for the field I’m going into. I have an interview with this super important professor! If I make a good impression with her, I basically have a place in the school,” you explain, folding some tee shirts.

“Oh,” he sighs, looking disappointed. “Hey, when do you leave?” Peter asks, attempting to sound chirpy.

“Day after tomorrow.”

“Oh, well do you want to grab a bite to eat with me?”

“Of course! Let me just get changed and I’ll meet you in a moment,” you smile as Peter walks out the room. You slip on a dress, placing a coat over the top to try combat the cold winds. Walking out the door, you see Peter leaning against the wall.

“Hey.” You wave.

“Ready to go, m’lady?” He laughs, extending his arm for you.

“As I’ll ever be!”

[[MORE]]

————

He leads you to the pizzeria the two of you always frequent.

“What a good choice!” You smile as you walk inside the restaurant.

Peter goes up to the counter and orders two pizzas for the both of you, knowing you wouldn’t want to share. He pays the cashier in loose change, counting out every penny.

“They’ll be ready in just a moment!” Peter says excitedly, hiding his financial situation from you.

“Great!” You laugh, tucking a loose strand of hair behind your ear.

“So why London?” He asks, trying to act casual while leaning on the counter.

“They have the best courses, everyone successful has been there!” You gush, getting excited of the thought of just going to such a prestigious school.

“Oh, that makes sense.”

“Order for two medium pizzas!” The cashier shouts, getting the attention of you and Peter.

You grab the two pizzas and start to walk out of the restaurant.

“Hey, where are we going?” Peter asks, jogging to catch up with you.

“I know a special little spot, I know you’re going to love it!” You gloat, taking a sharp turn down an alley.

“Down here?” Peter asks, confusion dripping from his voice.

“No, silly. Up there!” You point to the top of the building next to you before glancing to the fire escape next to you.

“Come on, Spiderman. Ready for a little climb? “ You laugh before sliding the pizzas up to the ledge and pulling yourself up the ladder.

He smirks and grabs the pizzas. He uses a web to launch himself to the top of the building.

“Come on, [Y/N]. Ready for a little climb?” He mocks your words from earlier, grinning from his perch.

You giggle and climb up to him.

“Like the view?” You ask, looking out across the New York skyline.

“It’s beautiful,” he sighs as he looks at the back of your head.

“Come on, let’s dig in!” You exclaim, sitting on the edge of the roof, the pizza box on your lap. You pat the ledge beside you, gesturing for Peter to sit down.

He plops down next to you, opening his pizza box. He smiles as the steam puffs up.

“Wow, this looks so good!” You smile, taking the piping hot pizza in your hands.

“I know! Pizza and a best friend, the best way to spend an evening.” He takes a small, meek bite.

“Pete, what’s up? You’ve been off since I told you about London…” You trail off when you realise his reason for his change in personality. “It won’t change anything, I’ll always be your best friend,” you say in a low voice, keeping calm to make sure Peter keeps calm.

“[Y/N, I know, I know nothing’ll change,” he reassures you, “but that’s the whole problem!” He shouts, his tone suddenly escalating. He stands up, letting the box full of pizza fall to the roof behind him. “Please, [Y/N, say you know what I mean?” He pleads, eyes begging you.

“Peter, I’m so sorry, I don’t know what you mean?”

“[Y/N I adore you! I love you and I always have!” His voice becomes small, “I don’t know what I’m going to do without you…”

He sits on the ledge again, legs crossed so he can face you. His hand comes to cup your cheek, tilting your head up to look you in the eyes. “[Y/N, please, please say something.”

“I don’t know what to say, Peter, I never knew you felt this way about me,” you lock eyes with the boy in front of you, “I think I love you too.”

The lips of your childhood friend interlock with your own, your hands find the back of his head. You lean forward, letting your arms wrap around his neck. He pulls back, only to plant a kiss to your forehead. You let your head fall to his lap, lying on the ledge of the tower of apartments you both grew up in.

“Are you still going to London?”

“I have to, Peter. This is the best opportunity of my life!” You exclaim, excitement in your voice.

“Think it’s too late to book a flight to London?”

“Of course not!” You laugh, leaning up to kiss him again.

title: My Home (Part 15)
body:
Peter Parker x Reader

Part 15… Y/n Y/ln

Word count: 1.51 k words

A/n: Tell me if you want to get added to the TAGLIST of My Home! For more parts see ‘MASTERLIST’ in my profile description! Taglist in the reblogged post. Tell me if you wanna get added :)

Reader’s POV:

It was time, to tell the truth, the complete truth. I took a deep sigh, closing my eyes shut.

It seemed like someone pressed the rewind button, that too in 8x speed, leaving me at the beginning, the very beginning!

“It took centuries to make Chronicom a green, happy planet. We were thankful to our new king who made all this possible. His name was Enoch. He lived 365 years for us, to ensure that his children lived, he was my great great grandfather. He was so much different from his elder brother Kaius, the king of Atlantis, the reason why we were abandoned to a far-flung planet. Enoch was a God for all of us, everyone loved him, everyone prayed day and night so that he could live forever, enlighten all the coming generations. We thought that the prayers were the thing keeping him alive, until one day after 365 years he finally died.

The day was a historical day, everyone was mourning for him, Enoch was considered divine, his death was something beyond belief. We were wrong! He wasn’t alive so long, because of him being divine or holy, but because of the 3 rings, he owned. He never wore them, but he was connected to them. The rings were miles, even light years apart from him, but still he could use their powers. He died because someone else found them, 2 of them. Her name was Dorothea, Kauis’s only heir. She was close to Enoch, he loved her like a daughter. She used his love to find out the reason for his immortality and succeeded. She captured 2 of the rings that were buried deep inside Chronicom by Enoch. The sudden retrieval of 2 of the 3 rings made Enoch weak, he died of that. Dorothea made herself young again, we thought she would kill all of us, but she rather introduced better food and living for us. I befriended her, she was my far relative. I was just 10 years old and that 200 years old Dorothea who looked like she was 18, was already my best friend. Although I’m 17, I can bet she still looks like 18. There was something in her, that made people believe her. And I loved to hang out with her, to get the spotlight. We became close friends, almost like sisters at least from my side. Everything was going so smooth, but then she finally revealed her plan. She finally found the location of the third and last ring, that was on Earth. So, she sent me here, to retrieve it. Her true intentions weren’t to kill our people, but yours. If she gets all the 3 rings, she will make the whole Earth sunk underwater like Atlantis, killing everyone, to take revenge for the people of Atlantis who died, when we were abandoned. I supported her, in this plan. I did support her, I too wanted revenge. Also, she threatened me to kill my family if I fail.

But now after coming here, spending more than four years on this planet, I realized it’s not good to kill the current generation because of the mistakes your ancestors did. So I remained silent. Hidden. Trying to adjust in this planet, to make it my home. So that she couldn’t complete her intentions and my family won’t be hurt. I’m no more like her. I just prayed to meet my family, to go back home, my real home. But, it can’t happen.”

I was just finished with telling the truth. I didn’t even notice Peter’s reaction when I heard someone’s footsteps behind before I could even turn to see who it was, I felt electrocuted. My body was shivering at an immense rate, making my vision blurry, I turned back to see Fury, Nick Fury?!

This taser is of course not working on two 3-volt lithium batteries, like the normal one, its fucking something higher than 10 volts!

Peter wasn’t responding, he was looking at me in disbelief.

Something wrong is going to happen.
Wait it’s actually happening!

I could pass out within nano-seconds, so I intentionally made my trembling body fall over Peter, secretly sliding that ring into that nearly invisible Spider-man suit pocket.

After that, what else can happen? Who can resist this extreme taser shock?

So… I fainted, even Thor couldn’t resist this taser attack, who am I?

Everything went black, just black…!

•••
I woke about 15 minutes later! How do I know this? There is a freakin’ wall clock, just in front of me. There is a bed, a desk with a flower pot, a wooden floor with a carpet laid, there were lamps, an entirely furnished room!

I didn’t know SHIELD prison looked like this?

Just the only negative thing is that I’m tied to a chair.

I’m pretty sure it isn’t SHIELD!

And as speaking of SHIELD, I heard the door cracking open revealing Nick Fury.

“I didn’t know your prison facilities were so much better than my own bedroom.”

“The queen purchased the best facility in New York, till she finds the ring.”

“Queen? Ring? Fu-Fury?”

And he laughed at my question, moving his arm towards his face lifting up skin???

And his face showed picture cells, like on an electronic screen.

“You know these photostatic veil made by Selwyn have served a lot of SHIELD and HYDRA agents and now they are serving Chromicoms too.”

“Jonah…?! ”

That voice was of Jonah, and he pulled off that nano face mask revealing his face.

“Where’s Peter??”

“You mean that kid standing with you? I convinced him that you were found guilty of contacting our Queen Dorothea. He appeared so broken when he handed you to us” he explained with a fake pout.

“Asshole,” I said trying to get out of the ropes, failing miserably.

“Awww… Young love, so cute”

I turned my head, hearing another voice.

“Dorothea??!”

“Thea, call me Queen Thea!”

That evil Dorothea showed up in front of me, biting an apple held by her hands full of rings and jewellery.

“He is gonna miss you, so sad for him,” she said pressing her lips.

“I think we should kill her, your highness, she failed in finding the ring” Jonah spoke up.

“Kill me and you won’t even know where the ring is now,” I said slightly laughing.

“You already found it” ‘Thea’ curiously asked keeping her apple down.

“Found it four years ago, just changed my mind, handling it to you”

“What? but you said you were still finding it? ” Jonah got confused.

“Can’t I lie?” I said tilting my head.

“Where is it now?? ” he yelled.

“It’s over Jonah. Sending me fake information” Thea said, taking out a sword that was hanging from her armour.

Jonah pleaded not to kill him, but she passed that sword into his abdomen in one go, making him fall on the ground dead. I almost freaked out at this.

“You don’t wanna die too right? Tell me where is the last ring?”

“You can’t kill me, Thea, you need me to get it for you.”

She groaned.

“Then tell where is it?”

“Only after my death.”

“You got so uptight living, with these poor humans, but I got a solution to this!” she tittered, moving back.

“What?”

And then with a thud sound, 4 metal walls surrounded me, one of them had a glass window. The ropes were automatically untied with a clicking sound. I rushed up from the chair. I banged through the glass window, only to see Dorothea laughing, faintly. She had a controller in her hand, like a remote control, and in a flash that room looked like an aeroplane, accompanied by the sound of ejection sequence. I peeped through the window only to see the plane’s floor beneath my storage pod was opening revealing a big ocean underneath.

It wasn’t any facility in New York, it was a freakin’ hellicarrier.

“I can find that ring myself, it will be an honour to die in the Atlantic Ocean with our ancestors,” she said, watching my storage pod clinging to the side of the opening.

I banged that window with my whole strength, screaming and screaming, but she just watched my pod falling from a great altitude into that ocean.

Due to gravity, my body floated to the roof of the storage pod, making my head bang to its roof. I fell on the floor, unconscious, locked in a storage pod, 8500 metres below the earth surface, somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean.

He wasn’t alive so long, because of him being divine or holy, but because of the 3 rings, he owned. He never wore them, but he was connected to them. The rings were miles, even light years apart from him, but still he could use their powers. He died because someone else found them, 2 of them. Her name was Dorothea, Kauis’s only heir. She was close to Enoch, he loved her like a daughter. She used his love to find out the reason for his immortality and succeeded. She captured 2 of the rings that were buried deep inside Chronicom by Enoch. The sudden retrieval of 2 of the 3 rings made Enoch weak, he died of that. Dorothea made herself young again, we thought she would kill all of us, but she rather introduced better food and living for us. I befriended her, she was my far relative. I was just 10 years old and that 200 years old Dorothea who looked like she was 18, was already my best friend. Although I’m 17, I can bet she still looks like 18. There was something in her, that made people believe her. And I loved to hang out with her, to get the spotlight. We became close friends, almost like sisters at least from my side. Everything was going so smooth, but then she finally revealed her plan. She finally found the location of the third and last ring, that was on Earth. So, she sent me here, to retrieve it. Her true intentions weren’t to kill our people, but yours. If she gets all the 3 rings, she will make the whole Earth sunk underwater like Atlantis, killing everyone, to take revenge for the people of Atlantis who died, when we were abandoned. I supported her, in this plan. I did support her, I too wanted revenge. Also, she threatened me to kill my family if I fail.

But now after coming here, spending more than four years on this planet, I realized it’s not good to kill the current generation because of the mistakes your ancestors did. So I remained silent. Hidden. Trying to adjust in this planet, to make it my home. So that she couldn’t complete her intentions and my family won’t be hurt. I’m no more like her. I just prayed to meet my family, to go back home, my real home. But, it can’t happen.”

I was just finished with telling the truth. I didn’t even notice Peter’s reaction when I heard someone’s footsteps behind before I could even turn to see who it was, I felt electrocuted. My body was shivering at an immense rate, making my vision blurry, I turned back to see Fury, Nick Fury?!

This taser is of course not working on two 3-volt lithium batteries, like the normal one, its fucking something higher than 10 volts!

Peter wasn’t responding, he was looking at me in disbelief.

Something wrong is going to happen.
Wait it’s actually happening!

I could pass out within nano-seconds, so I intentionally made my trembling body fall over Peter, secretly sliding that ring into that nearly invisible Spider-man suit pocket.

After that, what else can happen? Who can resist this extreme taser shock?

So… I fainted, even Thor couldn’t resist this taser attack, who am I?

Everything went black, just black…!

•••
I woke about 15 minutes later! How do I know this? There is a freakin’ wall clock, just in front of me. There is a bed, a desk with a flower pot, a wooden floor with a carpet laid, there were lamps, an entirely furnished room!

I didn’t know SHIELD prison looked like this?

Just the only negative thing is that I’m tied to a chair.

I’m pretty sure it isn’t SHIELD!

And as speaking of SHIELD, I heard the door cracking open revealing Nick Fury.

“I didn’t know your prison facilities were so much better than my own bedroom.”

“The queen purchased the best facility in New York, till she finds the ring.”

“Queen? Ring? Fu-Fury?”

And he laughed at my question, moving his arm towards his face lifting up skin???

And his face showed picture cells, like on an electronic screen.

“You know these photostatic veil made by Selwyn have served a lot of SHIELD and HYDRA agents and now they are serving Chromicoms too.”

“Jonah…?! ”

That voice was of Jonah, and he pulled off that nano face mask revealing his face.

“Where’s Peter??”

“You mean that kid standing with you? I convinced him that you were found guilty of contacting our Queen Dorothea. He appeared so broken when he handed you to us” he explained with a fake pout.

“Asshole,” I said trying to get out of the ropes, failing miserably.

“Awww… Young love, so cute”

I turned my head, hearing another voice.

“Dorothea??!”

“Thea, call me Queen Thea!”

That evil Dorothea showed up in front of me, biting an apple held by her hands full of rings and jewellery.

“He is gonna miss you, so sad for him,” she said pressing her lips.

“I think we should kill her, your highness, she failed in finding the ring” Jonah spoke up.

“Kill me and you won’t even know where the ring is now,” I said slightly laughing.

“You already found it” ‘Thea’ curiously asked keeping her apple down.

“Found it four years ago, just changed my mind, handling it to you”

“What? but you said you were still finding it? ” Jonah got confused.

“Can’t I lie?” I said tilting my head.

“Where is it now?? ” he yelled.

“It’s over Jonah. Sending me fake information” Thea said, taking out a sword that was hanging from her armour.

Jonah pleaded not to kill him, but she passed that sword into his abdomen in one go, making him fall on the ground dead. I almost freaked out at this.

“You don’t wanna die too right? Tell me where is the last ring?”

“You can’t kill me, Thea, you need me to get it for you.”

She groaned.

“Then tell where is it?”

“Only after my death.”

“You got so uptight living, with these poor humans, but I got a solution to this!” she tittered, moving back.

“What?”

And then with a thud sound, 4 metal walls surrounded me, one of them had a glass window. The ropes were automatically untied with a clicking sound. I rushed up from the chair. I banged through the glass window, only to see Dorothea laughing, faintly. She had a controller in her hand, like a remote control, and in a flash that room looked like an aeroplane, accompanied by the sound of ejection sequence. I peeped through the window only to see the plane’s floor beneath my storage pod was opening revealing a big ocean underneath.

It wasn’t any facility in New York, it was a freakin’ hellicarrier.

“I can find that ring myself, it will be an honour to die in the Atlantic Ocean with our ancestors,” she said, watching my storage pod clinging to the side of the opening.

I banged that window with my whole strength, screaming and screaming, but she just watched my pod falling from a great altitude into that ocean.

Due to gravity, my body floated to the roof of the storage pod, making my head bang to its roof. I fell on the floor, unconscious, locked in a storage pod, 8500 metres below the earth surface, somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean.

blog.name: ubernegro
blog.title: The meanderings of clinically depressed black male
blog.description: Hello, this blog was generally about comic books and still is, but I lost the ability to scan my comics so instead of misadvertising and misleading. This is just a normal blog where I just detail my interests and ocasionally rant about comics, films, or media like normal people. I am also clinically depressed and been asked to commit to a hospital, but it's Florida and they want to dope me up with enough drugs so I can't feel aything without my permission if I do commit myself. I rather be in pain than numb to feeling things. Anyways, off on that bleak and dark point, welcome and enjoy.

summary: Sleepy Nights
title: Sleepy Nights
body:
Summary: Peter texting you and asking you to take a break from studying to go and see him.

Pairing: Peter Parker X Reader

Warnings: None! Just fluff!

It was Friday night, and as the nights grew darker earlier, your stress grew greater as well, as midterms gloomed near.

You were sat in your room, leaning on your arm as your eyes pored over the material in your textbook, your eyes struggling to stay awake as your head slowly….slid down your arm…. and hit your…. desk, shaking yourself awake as not to slam your face into your book.

You exhaled deeply and looked over to your roommate, who was also studying but had fallen asleep with an open notebook filled with History notes.

You yawned and rubbed your eyes, about to turn in for the night, when you got a sudden text from your boyfriend.

Laying in his room, Peter was sprawled in his bed, the TV on as he watched a movie.

He wasn’t really paying attention, having you on his mind.

He then decided to text you, wanting to check on you since he hadn’t seen you lately and was concerned.

Peter: Hey Babe.

You: Hey Peter.

Peter: So, what are you doing? Studying as per usual?

You: Yes, of course. But I’m really tired, I don’t think I’ll be able to keep my eyes open for much longer.

Peter: Then come over to my dorm, I’ll cuddle you to sleep.

You: Peter, c'mon…

Peter: Pleaseee? Come on, I haven’t seen you all week, upcoming finals week has got you cooped up in your room.

Peter: Your boyfriend misses you, babe.

Peter: Please come to my dorm and fall asleep with your boyfriend who misses you dearly??

You bit your lip as you left Peter waiting for an answer, looking over to your roommate, Michelle, who was fast asleep, her phone ringing.

You got up and looked at her phone, noticing it was one of your best friends calling.

You smiled lightly and picked it up, knowing she wouldn’t mind since you two had been friends since high school.

“Hey, Ned. Michelle’s here sleeping, so feel free to come over and keep her company. I’m headed to Peter’s. I’ll leave the door open for you. Hopefully, she’ll be up by then. If not, just knock on the door extra loud.” you explained playfully.

On the other end of the line, Ned replied with a chuckle and an “Alright, I’ll come through then.” he said, hanging up.

You smiled and put her phone down, looking at her and lightly shaking her awake. “Michelle, I invited Ned to come and hang out with you,” you said softly.

Michelle simply nodded and yawned, moving her books.

“Okay, that’s fine,” Michella mumbled sleepily, not fully understanding due to sleep.

You simply laughed softly and smiled, going back to answer Peter, who was still awaiting a reply.

You: …. fineeee, but only because I’m dozing off here.

Peter: ❤️ I’ll be here, waiting.

You smiled as you texted your boyfriend and grabbed your jacket and keys, slipping on the jacket and putting your keys in your pocket.

You looked over to Michelle and chuckled, as she would surely be confused to see Ned here in a few minutes, but certainly wouldn’t mind his presence.

You shook your head and yawned as you headed out, closing the door quietly behind you and leaving it unlocked for Ned before slipping your gloves on and heading out to get the attention you missed all week from the guy that you loved.

summary: wake up and smell the coffee
title: wake up and smell the coffee
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2HD9PlY

by peter_parkerson (pidgeotto_gunderson)

“Hey, Cap,” Tony says, and all eyes turn to him. “You usually have an opinion - a wrong opinion, but an opinion nonetheless. What’s your take?”

Steve doesn’t turn his head. Doesn’t respond. Doesn’t even blink.

Huh. Okay.

Across the room, Sam Wilson leans forward, elbows resting on the table, and says, “Steve? You alright?”

Still nothing.

Holy shit. Holy fucking shit. This just in - Steve Rogers, the Steve Rogers, has issues just like the rest of them.
